alert.note: Alert for Black Hawk; Grundy (Iowa) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued August 19 at 3:55PM CDT until August 19 at 4:45PM CDT by NWS DesMoines
info.description: The National Weather Service in Des Moines has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Southwestern Black Hawk County in northeastern Iowa... Northeastern Grundy County in central Iowa... * Until 445 PM CDT. * At 354 PM CDT, a severe thunderstorm was located near Holland or 5 miles north of Grundy Center, moving east at 20 mph. HAZARD...Half dollar size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Damage to vehicles is expected. * Locations impacted include... Dike, Uni-Dome And McLeod Center, Hudson, Waterloo, Waterloo Municipal Airport and George Wyth State Park. This replaces the previous Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued for this thunderstorm. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.25 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...<50 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
